name: 2022 the 12th International Conference on Communication and Network Security
content: Publication: Submitted paper will be peer reviewed by conference committees. The accepted paper will be included into ICCNS 2022 Conference Proceedings, which will be archived in the ACM Digital Library, and indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus. The ISBN number assigned to ICCNS 2022 is 978-1-4503-9753-7
